text: 1:22 Rom 8:16-17; 2 Korin 5:5; Efesus 1:13-14; 2 Timoti 2:19; 1 Jon 2:27; Akar Mogomem 2:17Egha a uabɨ uan inabazir ababanim e gatɨ, kamaghɨn me en gan fogh suam, e an gumazamizibara. Egha uan Duam en navir averiabar ikiasa an e ganɨngi. Godɨn Duamra a uaghan bizir aghuir faragha zuir mam, God e danɨngasa. E Godɨn Duam inigha gɨvagha, kamaghɨn e fo, e guizbangɨra bizir avɨrir maba sara iniam.
